metadata.name: Visual Studio NodejsTools PressAnyKey Renamed Execution
metadata.comment: Detects renamed execution of "Microsoft.NodejsTools.PressAnyKey.exe", which can be abused as a LOLBIN to execute arbitrary binaries

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('microsoft.nodejstools.pressanykey.exe') AND NOT endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\microsoft.nodejstools.pressanykey.exe')))

output.summary: Detects renamed execution of "Microsoft.NodejsTools.PressAnyKey.exe", which can be abused as a LOLBIN to execute arbitrary binaries
